thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kunwu Jiuding Investment Holdings shareholders to transfer stake in three firms to co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kunwu Jiuding Investment Holdings shareholders to transfer stake in three firms to co

organizations.name: kunwu jiuding investment holdings co ltd

text:
Feb 7(Reuters) - Kunwu Jiuding Investment Holdings Co Ltd
* Says coâ€™s indirect controlling shareholder plans to transfer 70 percent stake in a Beijing-based investment management firm to the co
* Says a Lhasa-based wholly owned unit of the indirect controlling shareholder will transfer a 25 percent and a 70 percent stake in Beijing-based fund management firm and asset management firm to the co respectively
* Says no payment in the transfer
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/1E83sJ
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
